Name: Re FF2 PixelRemaster
Author: gvdn
Description:
Alterations:

-All player character sprites (except Toad and Mini)

-NPCs with unique names, almost all sprites

-Barehanded attack graphics in battle scenes

-All vehicle sprites (except for the flying dragon)

-Animation settings for airship propeller speed, canoe behavior, etc.

Attention:

-It is recommended to use moogle-mod-manager.

https://github.com/KiameV/moogle-mod-manager/releases/latest

-It is possible to replace files without using "moogle-mod-manager". However, it is recommended to make a backup of the entire file in advance because of the many modifications and intricacies of the file.

-Memoria works with or without Memoria. However, it is recommended to set 

  "Import text resources: .png, .jpg, .tga" to false.
